long_description: The 105 CS-5700 10-speed cassette shifts with confidence and crispness that is instantly identifiable as Shimano. Computer-designed Hyperglide (HG) sprockets incorporate specifically-positioned shift ramps and tooth profiles for improved chain control during shifting. Lightweight aluminum carrier and nickel-plated finish provide long-lasting durability. Choose from 3 sprocket combinations: 11/28, 12/25 or 12/27.
short_description: The 105 CS-5700 10-speed cassette shifts with confidence and crispness that is instantly identifiable as Shimano.
